en.description: Extensive expertise, specializing in NestJS framework to build enterprise-scale applications and microservices architectures that serve millions of users.

en.description: Proficient in Python for automated testing and quality assurance, utilizing Behave/Cucumber for behavior-driven development (BDD) to ensure robust software delivery.

en.title: Golang
en.description: Familiar with Go for building high-performance backend services and microservices, leveraging its concurrency model and efficiency.

de.description: Vertraut mit Go zum Aufbau leistungsstarker Backend-Dienste und Microservices, unter Nutzung seines Nebenläufigkeitsmodells und seiner Effizienz.

en.description: Experienced in deploying and managing applications on AWS, utilizing services like EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, SQS, SNS and CloudFormation for scalable and reliable cloud solutions.

de.description: Erfahren in der Bereitstellung und Verwaltung von Anwendungen auf AWS unter Nutzung von Diensten wie EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, SQS, SNS und CloudFormation für skalierbare und zuverlässige Cloud-Lösungen.

en.description: Proactively volunteered for leadership roles and took responsibility for high-impact projects and presentations.
